message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for offering! While I'm interested in the product, $12,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $8,000?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I've got to make a profit on this one. I can meet you in the middle at $10,000, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. What do you think?
